verses.text: ¿Tas val yuj tz'el veq'uek'oc yav eb' ch'oc chonhab'il sq'uechaanh? ¿Tas val yuj slajtiej sb'a eb' t'a junok tas manh ol tzak'van eb' sb'oani?
Ha eb' vinh rey yet' eb' yajal t'a juntzanh chonhab' chi', schichonoch sk'ool eb', junlajanxonhej syutej slajtian sb'a eb' yoch ajk'olal t'a Jehová yet' t'a Vinh Rey Sik'b'ilel yuj.
Slaj yalan eb' icha tik: Quiq'uequel co b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' Dios yic manhxalaj yalan yic t'ayonh, xchi eb'.
Ha Jehová Yajal t'a satcha’anh tonhej stzetzaj val eb' yuj, sb'uchji eb' yuj.
Scot yoval t'a eb', xib'taj eb' yuj. Yed' yoval sk'ool ol yalan t'a eb' icha tik:
Toxo ix vak'och yopisio Vinh Rey t'a tzalan Sion, aton jun tzalan sik'b'ilel vuuj, xcham Jehová chi'.
Axo Vinh Rey Sik'b'ilel chi' tz'alani: Svalcanel tastac ix sna Jehová. Ix yal t'ayin: Ha t'a jun k'u tik, tzin ch'oxeli to Vuninal ach.
k'an t'ayin, ol vak'an juntzanh nivac chonhab' yet' masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik t'ayach.
Ol ak' yajalil t'a yib'anh eb' yet' val a poder. Ol a satel eb' icha tz'aj smak'jipoj junok lum chen t'a junok q'uen k'ococh, xchi t'ayin, xchi Vinh Uninab'il chi'.
Ha ticnaic jun, ex sreyal, ex yajalil juntzanh chonhab', jelanocab' tzeyutej e pensar, scham val e k'ayb'an tas svala'.
Hak'uequem e b'ha t'a Jehová t'a tzalajk'olal, ayocab' yelk'och t'a yol e sat.
Emnaquil tzeyutej pax e b'a t'ay t'a smasanil e k'ool, yic max cot yoval t'ayex. Tato maay, ol ex satel yuj, yujto elanhchamel scot yoval. Te tzalajk'olal yic masanil eb' scol sb'ha t'a Jehová.
